content: Once the Tiger Vanguard boss has been defeated, you can exit the temple by heading down the steps on the far side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Once the Tiger Vanguard boss has been defeated, you can exit the temple by heading down the steps on the far side.
